overview: Stackkart.com is online book store and registered trademark of Stackkart.Com Traders Pvt.Ltd. This company have been incorporated on September 2011 and started its online operations on January 2012. Stackkart, basically founded by non technical person Mr.Neeraj Sehgal and her wife Mrs. Vanshika Sehgal. The reason to choose this industry because the owner of the company are belonging to books industry for last 15 years. So, they found this interesting to expand their iq and business in other serviceable area.
